analysis.key_quote: I don’t see how reinterpreting decades of federal employment law is legal given the Supreme Court decision in West Virginia v. EPA, 142 S. Ct. 2587, 2607–2608 (2022).
analysis.rationale: The comment raises legal concerns about the reinterpretation of federal employment law, indicating opposition to the proposed rule. It suggests that such changes should be made by Congress, which aligns with a defense of the existing merit-based system.
